I'm just excited that I got my first win and I can now try to get a lot more. Tayshaun Prince added 26 points and 11 rebounds for the Pistons, who had lost their first two games since acquiring Allen Iverson from Denver last week for All-Star point guard Chauncey Billups , key reserve Antonio McDyess and Cheikh Samb .
